column5: Centrally located at Downtown Houston, close to all of the sports arenas, several of the most popular restaurants and nightlife in the city as well as conveniently located to the freeways and public transit, the Texas Medical center, many great parks, biking and jogging trails. This is an awesome home with many very unique architectural features. My place is good for couples, families, solo adventurers, business travelers. Free parking. Special request - just ask!
